automation.step: Create a new folder named `website` in the workspace to contain the project files.
Add index.html using the provided HTML boilerplate, Tailwind CSS, and build the dark gradient portfolio layout with hero, brand strip, and services.
Add a minimal script for interactive toasts and button actions; enable KV tracking for clicks; ensure editable text attributes are set.
Serve the website locally using `npx sirv-cli website` and test via browser.
Open the local site, verify responsiveness and interactions, and iterate if needed.
Deploy the website and return the deployed URL.
